title: Add tk next --awaiting for human mode
description:
Add --awaiting flag to tk next command for human workflow

Usage:
  tk next epic-id              # Agent mode: next agent-workable task
  tk next epic-id --awaiting   # Human mode: next task needing human
  tk next epic-id --awaiting approval  # Specific awaiting type

Current behavior:
  tk next returns first ready task (not blocked, not manual)

New behavior with --awaiting:
  - Filter to ticks where Awaiting != null
  - Optional value filters to specific type(s)
  - Sort by priority (same as agent mode)
  - Return single tick (first match)

This enables human workflow:
  human$ tk next --awaiting
  abc - "Review security changes" [awaiting: approval]
  human$ tk show abc  # Review the work
  human$ tk approve abc  # Or tk reject abc "feedback"

Implementation:
- Add --awaiting flag to next FlagSet
- If flag present, filter differently
- Consider showing awaiting type in output
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] --awaiting flag added to next command
- [ ] Without value: returns any awaiting task
- [ ] With value: filters to specific type(s)
- [ ] Returns single task (sorted by priority)
- [ ] Output shows awaiting type
- [ ] Works without epic-id (searches all)
